briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of TEZ/IVA in Subjects Aged 6 Through 11 Years With Cystic Fibrosis
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Double-blind, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Tezacaftor in Combination With Ivacaftor in Subjects Aged 6 Through 11 Years With Cystic Fibrosis, Homozygous or Heterozygous for the F508del-CFTR Mutation
summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy of tezacaftor in combination with ivacaftor (TEZ/IVA) in participants with cystic fibrosis (CF) aged 6 through 11 years, who are homozygous for the F508del mutation (F/F) or heterozygous for F508del with an eligible residual function mutation (F/RF).

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in Lung Clearance Index 2.5 (LCI2.5) Through Week 8

commonTop: Infective pulmonary exacerbation of cystic fibrosis
